articles.author: Jeremy Kahn
articles.title: How much of the AI boom is underpinned by Nvidia's own balance sheet? Investors increasingly are asking. - Fortune
articles.description: Nvidia's investments in customers draws unwelcome parallels to runaway customer financing and revenue 'roundtripping' in past technology booms.
articles.content: Nvidias announcement earlier this week that it is investing $100 billion into OpenAI to help fund its massive data center build out has added to a growing sense of unease among investors that there i… [+9284 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Ebola outbreak in DR Congo rages, with 61% death rate and funding running dry - Ars Technica
articles.description: Responders ask for $25 million to contain the disease. They have $2.2 million.
